title: University of Bristol - Equipment Account
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
findingsText:
This account currently includes the following:



Composites Innovation: from Atoms to Applications

Power Electronics Capital Funding

High-resolution scanning electron microscope (HRSEM)



All are either in the process of procuring equipment, or have completed procurement in the recent past.  Aerospace/ Defence and Marine,Chemicals,Electronics,Energy,Manufacturing/ including Industrial Biotechology
